Name: Take Thai
Review Text: A great restaurant with tasy food and a super friendly staff. While I would have given it 5 stars, I honestly feel that they are lacking in terms of vegetables. For example, I ordered one of the duck dishes, and like all main dishes it is …

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: We found this place by mistake when my planned gluten free find had closed! It was so great. In a fun downtown area with bars or walking for after. The Thai was amazing and authentic. Most of the menu can be gluten free. So great!!!

Name: Take Thai
Review Text:
Amazing place with lovely staff!
The food is out of this world.
We tried the stir fried noodles which were simply phenomenal.

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: So.... new location but same fabulous team. The food remains amazing! Top Thai in Amsterdam .. yes it’s not the most glamour location ... but.. it’s a huge terrace and the inside is so cozy and authentic. Duck in red curry 150%!

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: This place has awfully tasty Thai dishes on offer and I've been there several times. Super friendly service and an informal but nice white interior makes this a great place to enjoy dinner with friends or partner.

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Best Thai Food  in Amsterdam! Love the mixed starter and the chicken with pepper and garlic!

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: By far and away the best pad Thai I’ve ever had in Amsterdam. Will become a regular! Fantastic!

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Very tasty food and wonderful service. We definitely will come back

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Really nice and cozy place and the food was delicious.

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Food was great and staff were prompt and efficient. Had the daily special for 2. Will be back!

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Amazing food and service! I recommend the TT Gin!

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Nice place with great service and food! It is in a very touristy area of Amsterdam but we didn’t find it lacking. :)

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Amazing Thai food! Loved the red curry and the pad Thai and dumplings. Very friendly service too.

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Pleasant surroundings and very attentive and friendly staff. Food very good - beef with Thai basil was outstanding. Only minor criticism was the fact that a couple of the dishes were a little too heavy on the fish sauce. But overall a great experience. Recommended.

Name: Take Thai
Review Text:
Terrible. Box was broken when it arrived.

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: They moved to a rather dodgy square where they now have a wonderful huge terrace. Food is even better than before and a real gem for Thorbeckeplein. Service is professional and friendly. Loooove it!

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Great service, great food, great deserts. Jay was so helpful and really made us feel welcome.  The lobster soup was perfect!! You have to try it.

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Take Thai delivers yet again! Had to check it after visiting it last year during the ISE show and the Pad Thai is still amazing! The staff are very attentive and with great sense of humour, not too mention that they remembered me from last …

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Time to write a review after second visit to Take Thai. Food is authentic and delicious. Service is very attentive. We will come back!

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: OMG such a nice food! We loved everything we tried. Service was good as well as the atmosphere! Not cheap but neither too expensive. Recommend

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: I have been coming her for nearly 3 years and it has never disappointed me. Love the staff, food and beer.....book a table as they are very busy.

Name: Take Thai
Review Text: Pricier than expected. And the amount of food they served was too less. But their hospitality was great. We mistakenly ordered some beef dishes but they changed it without hesitation.

Review Text: Super good Thai food. Recommend it
